text: I often wonder how Repubs in Congress could be so irresponsible. But then I realized they are responsible -- not to voters but to the Kochs and the Mercers, and their cohorts. The Citizens United decision changed how elections work. The Kochs primaried every Republican with any independence. The ones left, for whatever reason, want to stay in office so badly they will do anything they are told they have to do to keep their jobs.
